name: Twin Plane
description:
Twin Plane is a side-scrolling game in which players tap to avoid obstacles.

The game is slightly more difficult because you control two planes each.

Playing is simple!

Press the button of the same color as the plane you want to control to control the plane.

Avoid hitting obstacles coming from the right.

This screenshot is in Japanese, but the game you can download and play is in English.

Materials used:.

Kenny Games（ https://www.kenney.nl/ ）

Game Music Studio（https://pianorm.com/?p=129）
